{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3091053,"name":"","username":"Wing","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/wing/{size}/175245_2.png","created_at":"2022-10-21T19:29:16.578Z","cooked":"

The title pretty much explains it all, I realize that there alot of similar posts however none of their solutions have helped. The specific error message that Im getting is SEVERE: Uncaught exception on thread main. java.lang.RuntimeException: Exception in Application init method at com.sun.javafx.application.LauncherImpl.launchApplication1(LauncherImpl.java:895) at com.sun.javafx.application.LauncherImpl.lambda$launchApplication$2(LauncherImpl.java:195) at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:829) Caused by: it.sauronsoftware.junique.AlreadyLockedException: Lock for ID "edu.wpi.first.shuffleboard.app.Shuffleboard" has already been taken at it.sauronsoftware.junique.JUnique.acquireLock(JUnique.java:136) at edu.wpi.first.shuffleboard.app.Shuffleboard.init(Shuffleboard.java:53) at com.sun.javafx.application.LauncherImpl.launchApplication1(LauncherImpl.java:824) ... 2 more

I can’t see anything related on the issue tracker. The message suggests that you are already running Shuffleboard. Does the problem persist if you reboot? Can you reproduce it on a second computer?

Well I got it to open but all of my values are displaying as blank and my booleans show as black, this was working just yesterday.

Capture1888×953 45.6 KB

here is my code: GitHub - rambots/Robot-2022: Robot code for FIRST 2022 Rapid React

Your picture cuts off the bottom of the screen. Does it say network tables is connected? If so, then the problem is likely on the robot code side. If it says not connected, then it’s likely on the networking side.

Edit: I don’t know what solved it because for the first time in months it just opened.
